title: The display of advertising signs on buildings and land, shall be in accordance with Part - 10, Section-2 "Signs and outdoor display structures" of National Building Code of India as amended from time to time and, shall be in accordance with respective rules / by-laws, directive given by Government, and also rules / by-laws framed by the Authority in this regards from time to time
clause_text: The display of advertising signs on buildings and land, shall be in accordance with Part - 10, Section-2 "Signs and outdoor display structures" of National Building Code of India as amended from time to time and, shall be in accordance with respective rules / by-laws, directive given by Government, and also rules / by-laws framed by the Authority in this regards from time to time.
